document.discussion_title: What may be the possible duration of therapy?
document.topic_text: Fitness » What may be the possible duration of therapy? What may be the possible duration of therapy? Asked Today, 10:07 PM What may be the possible duration of therapy growthandcare Duration [ 1 Answers ] I do not know how to get started, I need to find the duration of a fixed rate loan. Fixed rate loan asset is 65 million Have 5 year maturity, are priced at par and pay 12 percent annual interest. Thank you Can you start therapy with a therapist when therapy has been terminated by them [ 1 Answers ] I was in therapy with a therapist until today when she terminated therapy because she cannot trust me and so I am wondering does anyone know once I work on that stuff can I come back to this therapist or not she did not make that clear and I need to know. Thank you, Angela Sorenson Duration [ 1 Answers ] Is Duration better way to compare cash flows than simply comparing present values because Duration incorporates cash flow volatility or because Duration effectively treats cash flows as a perpetuity ,incorporating the reinvestment rate?
